title: SBI Clerk Mains Result 2025: Junior associate results declared - EducationTimes.com
text:
TNN | Posted June 12, 2025 12:02 PM
The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the results of the Clerk Mains Exam 2025. Candidates who appeared for the exam can now check their results on the official website. The Mains exam was held on April 10 and 12, 2025. A total of 13,732 candidates had appeared for the post of Junior Associate, which involves customer support and sales work. Specifically, 13,735 positions will be filled in this recruitment drive, including 5,870 for the unreserved category, 3,001 for OBC, 2,118 for SC, 1,385 for ST, and 1,361 for EWS candidates.
Available Posts
General category: 5,870 posts.
OBC (Other Backward Classes): 3,001 posts.
SC (Scheduled Caste): 2,118 posts.
ST (Scheduled Tribe): 1,385 posts.
EWS (Economically Weaker Section): 1,361 posts
How to Check Result
Visit the official website: https://sbi.co.in/
On the homepage, click on the "Careers" section.
Go to "Current Openings".
Find and click on "Recruitment of Junior Associates (Customer Support and Sales)".
Click on "SBI Clerk Mains Result 2025".
Use Ctrl + F to search for your roll number.
Download and save your result for future use.
Selection Process
To become a Junior Associate in SBI, candidates must clear three stages: Preliminary Exam, Main Exam and Language Proficiency Test (LPT). There is no interview in the selection process. Those who pass the Mains exam must take the LPT to prove they know the local language. If they pass this, they can join as SBI Clerks. Earlier, the Preliminary Exams were held on February 22, 27, 28 and March 1, 2025. The result for the prelims was announced on March 28, 2025.
